output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240017 PSD GIURGIU SENAT" is present at the end of the post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Directly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3 on the official list).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - This is a paid advertisement with significant reach (125,000-150,000 impressions) targeting Giurgiu and broader Romanian audience.
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Contains clear electoral messaging: - "E timpul pentru Marcel Ciolacu - președinte" - Direct call to vote: "votați după conștiința" - Explicitly endorses Marcel Ciolacu for president
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: While it contains personal endorsements from Piedone, it goes beyond personal opinion into direct electoral advocacy.
The post is particularly problematic because: - It's still running after the campaign period ended - Makes direct presidential endorsements - Has significant reach through paid promotion - Contains explicit electoral messaging

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This clearly constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains explicit endorsement for presidential candidate - Uses paid promotion to reach wide audience - Contains CMF number - Makes direct appeals to voters - Is running after campaign period ended
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Giurgiu, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei electorale pentru alegerile prezidențiale. Postarea cu ID-ul 1241527783630357 conține mesaje directe de susținere a candidatului prezidențial Marcel Ciolacu ("E timpul pentru Marcel Ciolacu - președinte"), fiind promovată ca reclamă plătită pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea include cod CMF (11240017), are caracter electoral explicit și se adresează unui public larg (125,000-150,000 impresii), reprezentând astfel propagandă electorală conform Art. 36(7).
